LanguageData.Catapult.label: 投石车
LanguageData.Catapult.description: 一种可重复发射石球的重型武器。石球砸中地面后散裂可以造成刺伤的效果。
LanguageData.Artillery_Catapult.label: 投石车
LanguageData.Artillery_Catapult.description: 一种可重复发射石球的重型武器。石球砸中地面后散裂可以造成刺伤的效果。
LanguageData.Ballista.label: 弩炮
LanguageData.Ballista.description: 一种以巨型箭为弹药的重型武器。发射周期长，但箭穿透物体时造成的洞口令人惊讶！
LanguageData.Artillery_Ballista.label: 弩炮
LanguageData.Artillery_Ballista.description: 一种以巨型箭为弹药的重型武器。慢，但它离开物体时造成的洞口多可怕！
LanguageData.Turret_KineticArtillery.label: Kinetic artillery
LanguageData.Turret_KineticArtillery.description: A gun with an accelerator of elementary particles. Forms a directed energy charge of high power.
LanguageData.Bullet_KineticArtillery.label: Ball of kinetic energy
LanguageData.Gun_KineticArtillery.label: Kinetic artillery
LanguageData.Gun_KineticArtillery.description: A gun with an accelerator of elementary particles. Forms a directed energy charge of high power.
LanguageData.Turret_MicrosingularCannon.label: Microsingular cannon
LanguageData.Turret_MicrosingularCannon.description: It shoots destabilizing balls that create a short-term singularity at the point of impact.
LanguageData.Bullet_MicrosingularCannon.label: Destabilizing energy ball
LanguageData.Gun_MicrosingularCannon.label: Microsingular cannon
LanguageData.Gun_MicrosingularCannon.description: It shoots destabilizing balls that create a short-term singularity at the point of impact.
